languages.text: "Превышена предельно допустимая концентрация в воздухе токсичных веществ. Членам экипажа рекомендовано активировать респираторную защиту".
"The upper limit for the concentration of toxins in the air has been exceeded. Crew members are advised to activate their respiratory protection."
languages.original_text: "Превышена предельно допустимая концентрация в воздухе токсичных веществ. Членам экипажа рекомендовано активировать респираторную защиту".

languages.text: “空气中的毒素浓度已经超过了上限，建议船员启动他们的呼吸器保护系统。”
languages.original_text: "The upper limit for the concentration of toxins in the air has been exceeded. Crew members are advised to activate their respiratory protection."

traits.locale_text: “空气中的毒素浓度已经超过了上限，建议船员启动他们的呼吸器保护系统。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Se ha superado el límite aceptable de concentración de toxinas en el aire. Aconsejo a los miembros de la tripulación activar su protección respiratoria».
languages.original_text: "The upper limit for the concentration of toxins in the air has been exceeded. Crew members are advised to activate their respiratory protection."

traits.locale_text: «Se ha superado el límite aceptable de concentración de toxinas en el aire. Aconsejo a los miembros de la tripulación activar su protección respiratoria».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「空気中の毒素の濃度が上限値を超えました。クルーには、呼吸保護装置の作動を推奨します」
languages.original_text: "The upper limit for the concentration of toxins in the air has been exceeded. Crew members are advised to activate their respiratory protection."

traits.locale_text: 「空気中の毒素の濃度が上限値を超えました。クルーには、呼吸保護装置の作動を推奨します」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Die Obergrenze für die Konzentration von Toxinen in der Luft wurde überschritten. Crewmitglieder sind angehalten, ihren Atemschutz zu aktivieren."
languages.original_text: "The upper limit for the concentration of toxins in the air has been exceeded. Crew members are advised to activate their respiratory protection."

traits.locale_text: "Die Obergrenze für die Konzentration von Toxinen in der Luft wurde überschritten. Crewmitglieder sind angehalten, ihren Atemschutz zu aktivieren."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Limite de concentration de toxines dans l'air dépassée. Les membres d'équipage sont priés d'activer leur protection respiratoire. »
languages.original_text: "The upper limit for the concentration of toxins in the air has been exceeded. Crew members are advised to activate their respiratory protection."

traits.locale_text: « Limite de concentration de toxines dans l'air dépassée. Les membres d'équipage sont priés d'activer leur protection respiratoire. »

languages.text: "Havadaki azami toksin birikimi seviyesi aşıldı. Mürettebatın solunum tedbirlerini etkinleştirmesi tavsiye edilir."
